jobDescription: • Minimum of 7-10 years of professional working experience in IS or equivalent business function Experience working with high level stakeholders is required• Ability to work effectively in a matrix organization structure with significant emphasis on collaboration and persuasion, rather than relying entirely on command and control.Previous experience with SAP data conversion tools, data model, and conversion methodologies.Techno-functional ERP expertise, including knowledge of available reports and database tables.Excellent coordination and communication skills.Experience of working large-scale ERP projects or ERP production support a plusAbility to translate functional requirements to test scenariosAbility to understand the data models and structures of complex technology systemsExperience analyzing and implementing interfaces between systems is an advantageMust be able to prepare regular written and verbal presentations, technical documents, and reports.Ability track record of successful delivery at the individual and team levelsExhibits acute business acumen and understanding of organizational issues and challengesExperience documenting complex processes and presenting them in a clear and understandable format is requiredAbility to facilitate discussions across geographically dispersed teams to derive solutions and alignDemonstrated leadership, interpersonal, analytical, change management and communication skills- provided by Dice Senior Data Migration Analyst
